summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from January 1, 2018, to January 31, 2018. It details the beginning and ending balances, deposits, withdrawals, and fees associated with the account during this period.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St Thomas, 00802, United States Virgin Islands
345 Park Avenue, New York, NY 10154, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $52,365,047.95 on January 1, 2018.
A transfer of $2,000,000.00 was made from the account on January 30, 2018.
The ending balance of the account as of January 31, 2018, was $365,988.53.
Interest of $940.58 was credited to the account during the statement period.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF (non-sufficient funds) items reported for this statement period.
